name: Kimberly Alidio
bio: Kimberly Alidio is the author of why letter ellipses (selva oscura, 2020); : once teeth bones coral : (Belladonna*, 2020); a cell of falls (Portable Press at Yo-Yo Labs, 2019); and after projects the resound (Black Radish, 2016). Her prose has appeared or will appear in Poetry Northwest, Social Text, American Quarterly, and in the essay collection Filipino Studies: Palimpsests of Nation and Diaspora.
